page.title: 08OUR WORLD-DITTON,WIDNES 1985
page.content: Terraced houses here and there, With broken windows everywhere. Factories smelling in the air, With chemicals floating everywhere. Schools all dirty, Towns all full of graffiti, Cars been stolen, Shop windows been broken, Riots rioting police, Oh I wish they'd leave the world in peace. {******************** GARY O'CONNOR *** Round our school is vandalism. Factories pollute the air. People dop litter. Criminals steal things. Arsenists burn things down. Rioters riot. Hooligans smash windows. Gangs clash. Thats our world. {******************* ANDREW CONDRON *** { OAKFIELD SCHOOL.
